definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Archaeologists have solved an ancient mystery surrounding the famous Easter Island statues.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家發現著名的復活節島巨古石像的祕密。

sentences.english: Gradually the archaeologists made the ancient site give up its secrets.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家們逐漸使古遺址失了神祕密感。

sentences.english: Archaeologists have unearthed evidence of glass-working and bone-carving workshops.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家已發現了玻璃作坊和骨雕作坊的證據。

sentences.english: The archaeologist dated the ruins as belonging to the early Minoan period.
sentences.chinese: 這位考古學家確定該廢墟屬於早期彌諾斯時期。

sentences.english: What cursed secrets have these archaeologists unearthed beneath the town?
sentences.chinese: 什麼詛咒的祕密有這些考古學家出土的鎮下？

sentences.english: Her novel featured a mummy coming back to life and seeking revenge against an archaeologist.
sentences.chinese: 她的小說表現了一個木乃伊復活並向考古學家復仇。

sentences.english: The archeologists found some ancient copper coins in the tomb.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家在墳墓中發現了一些古代的銅幣。

sentences.english: Archaeologists around the world are waiting for a glimpse of this newly-discovered civilization's artifacts.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家在世界各地都等待瞥見這個發現文明的文物。

sentences.english: He was an archeologist by trade, a dreamy poet.
sentences.chinese: 就職業而言，他是個考古學家，和一個多夢的詩人。

sentences.english: Archaeologists claimed they had unearthed the home where Jesus grew up.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家聲稱他們找到了耶穌兒時的住宅。

sentences.english: The two archaeologists believe the bluestones were thought to have magical curative powers.
sentences.chinese: 這兩位考古學家相信藍砂岩被認爲有神奇的醫療作用。

sentences.english: There are still many ancient mysteries that archeologists are looking into and trying to figure out.
sentences.chinese: 有許多古老謎團尚待考古學家來調查並試圖解開。

sentences.english: Great River train at a lot of history, historical authority of the scientists and archaeologists.
sentences.chinese: 河大歷史系培養處好多，歷史權威學家和考古學家。

sentences.english: In the1920s, archaeologists discovered the complete skull of Peking Man.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家發現了一塊完整的北京猿人顱骨，口譯。

sentences.english: The tomb contained what some archaeologists think may be one of the original craftsmen.
sentences.chinese: 該墓可能是一些考古學家認爲的最早的技工之一。

sentences.english: The stunning find left archeologists astonished.
sentences.chinese: 這個驚人的發現使得考古學家們感到非常的驚奇。

definition: Matteo Ricci (1552-1610), Jesuit missionary and translator in Ming China

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: Liu Yi (-285), famous incorruptible official of Western Jin dynasty the Western Jin dynasty 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316)/Liu Yi (-412), general of Eastern Jin dynasty 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420)

pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3
